title: Donation for ngo
selftext:
Hey folks! I am volunteer in a ngo. This organisation name is kshitiksha foundation which is located at noida, up. As a volunteer, a task is given to me to raise funds. It will be really helpful if you guys help us. If you want to know more about this organisation, check out this link -

https://www.thecompanycheck.com/org/kshitiksha-foundation/faa8ffbe0d

Link for donation - https://drive.google.com/file/d/1bCvgGf_fd-C6k-TF4sMaL5GJKv31Jh9X/view?usp=drive_web&authuser=0

You can dm me for donation receipt..
